text: Yesli [, o Mukhammad, v pokhode] ozhidalas' by legkaya dobycha i doroga byla by blizhnyaya, to [munafiki] posledovali by za toboy. Odnako rasstoyaniye pokazalos' im dal'nim, i oni [posle tvoyego vozvrashcheniya iz pokhoda] budut klyast'sya Allakhom [, opravdyvayas']: "Yesli by my mogli, to vystupili by s vami v pokhod". [Lozhnoy klyatvoy] oni tol'ko gubyat sebya, i Allakh znayet, chto oni lgut
